title: Casbah
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located in the Florentine neighborhood, this cafe offers a few vegan items marked on the menu: a burger served with regular or sweet potato fries and different toppings, and Malaysian tofu served with Asian salad. There are 2 vegan desserts: hot apple-poppyseed crumble and dorado (layers of mousse, cream, and chocolate on a nougat base).
